meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: When looking at a calendar, the <reading>子読み</reading> (こよみ) of it is to... well... not be able to read it at all. Because, children can't really read. So, when you look at a calendar you have to explain it to a child, since they cannot read it.
